author: gregthegreek
content: <@!301186049323958275> based on our conversations on 3788, would it make sense to update the current one to reflect the new design (pre-compile) or withdraw and submit a new one?

author: sky.cactus
content: What stage of the process is the current EIP in?

author: sky.cactus
content: If it is in Draft, then I have no problem with you completely gutting and rewriting it.

author: sky.cactus
content: If it is in Last Call I would be pretty strongly against that.

author: sky.cactus
content: If you think it is stuck, try closing and re-opening.  Sometimes CI gets stuck and that is the first thing to try (turn it off and on again).

author: gcolvin
content: I decided to close the request, delete the branch, and start afresh.  Worked for one of them.  Will try for the other, thanks.
